text: The minimum Java versions needed by each version of Ant don't seem to be documented anywhere.
creator: sebb@apache.org
peterreilly@apache.org
text: I have updated the manul (in the install section) with this information.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Might be useful to have this information on the web-site too.

Also, this information only applies to the forthcoming version; I was hoping that the Java requirements for previous versions could also be documented. The use case here is Ant is useful for building projects with early versions of Java that are not supported by other build tools such as Maven.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
well, in a way it is documented.  http://ant.apache.org/antnews.html#Ant 1.6.0

I'm not sure whether 1.7 really requires Java 1.3, but I don't have anything older than 1.4.1 to test it anyway.

I made it an entry in the FAQ, should go online in a few hours.
